name: KARTRIDER: DRIFT
summary: Get ready for KartRider: Drift, the only free-to-play, cross-platform kart racer where arcade thrills, drift fueled competition, and deep kart and character customization in stunning Unreal® Engine 4 graphics awaits you on the track.
